about_the_game:
Edge Islands mixes the gameplay of a Colony Sim with Tactical RPG elements like turn-based combats and heroes to level up.

Inspired by classics of the genre but more accessible, manage a team of adventurers landing on a procedural island, and explore dungeons while taking care of their needs, moods, traits and social interactions.

BUILD YOUR COLONY



Gather resources from your environment to build a colony for your heroes and prepare for their adventures. Make them cosy to improve their mood, farm and raise animals to provide food while facing changing weather and seasons. Then, when you are ready, recruit new members and expand until building a massive fortress. You will find many items and customization options to create a unique base!

ENGAGE IN TACTICAL COMBATS



Take part in turn-based tactical combats with your heroes. Use skills learned in the colony and earn XP to level up. Experience fast-paced combats with teams of 4 and based on placement and synergies between units.

EXPLORE & LOOT DUNGEONS



Explore procedural islands with points of interest and resources to improve the colony. Prepare and send groups on expeditions into procedural dungeons to retrieve loot and gold, allowing you to recruit new heroes and unlock new constructions.

TRAIN & MANAGE YOUR HEROES



Prepare your heroes for battle by building training facilities to unlock combat skills based on their classes. Craft them better equipment, potions, and items. But be careful: Training and fighting take time, and they also have other duties to perform for the colony!
And don’t forget to take care of their mood, ambitions and relationships to maximize their combat efficiency.

FEATURES


  • Endless Replayability: Maps, dungeons and heroes are procedurally generated to make every game unique and full of new adventures.
  • Heroes Customization: Personalize your heroes with classes, skills, and items to create unique fighting styles.
  • Management & Combats: A balanced system where you need to build to improve your combat skills, and you need to defeat enemies to unlock new constructions for your colony.
  • Accessible & Deep: Easily build an efficient colony, but don’t hesitate to optimize it thanks to advanced light or temperature propagation systems.
  • Custom Pacing: Progress by defeating dungeon bosses with increasing difficulty, but you can take your time to strengthen your heroes and develop your colony.
  • 3D Graphics: Discover simple yet beautiful 3D graphics combined with advanced lighting and atmospheric effects, which will make you enjoy decorating your base even more!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD or Intel, 3.3 GHz (AMD FX 8300, Intel i5 3000)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD/NVIDIA dedicated GPU, 2GB dedicated VRAM (Radeon RX 560, Geforce GTX 960)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Discover a unique blend of Colony Sim and Tactical RPG. Recruit and train your heroes, build your outpost, explore dungeons and engage in turn-based strategic battles to protect and expand your domain. Shape your stories by managing moods, relationships, ambitions and more!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America
